object.name: order
object.property: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf8'?> <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <fieldset name="custom" label="Custom"> <field name="data" type="zope.schema.Text"> <default>{}</default> <description/> <title>Data</title> </field> <field name="status" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <default>pending</default> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>status</title> <values> <element>pending</element> <element>rejected</element> <element>approved</element> </values> </field> <field name="early_birds" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description/> <title>Early birds</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="price" type="zope.schema.Decimal"> <description>Total price in EUR</description> <title>Price</title> </field> <field name="price_per_item" type="zope.schema.Decimal"> <description>Price in EUR per item</description> <title>Price per item</title> </field> <field name="pret" type="zope.schema.Decimal"> <description>Price in RON</description> <title>Pret</title> </field> <field name="pret_per_unitate" type="zope.schema.Decimal"> <description>Price per item in RON</description> <title>Pret per unitate</title> </field> <field name="exchange_rate" type="zope.schema.Decimal"> <description/> <title>Exchange rate</title> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
